com.gensym.util
Class ClassManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gensym.util.ClassManager
public class ClassManager
extends Object
implements DefinitionSymbols, AttributeExportSymbols, G2ClassSymbols

A class that manages G2 class definitions on the client. There is a ClassManager associated with every connection. The ClassManager can be queried for the definitions of a G2 class named by a symbol and to determine the value of a class attribute that could possibly be inherited from a superior Definition.

Constructor Detail

ClassManager

Method Detail

storeClassDefinition

public void storeClassDefinition(Symbol g2ClassName,
                                 G2Definition definition,
                                 boolean isSystemClass)
By the time this is called, we are guaranteed that all superclasses and their definitions have been downloaded. this method ensures that all the necessary inherited attributes are wired correctly for user defined classes. Just stores system defined classes, as the wiring is unnecessary.

getDefinition0

public G2Definition getDefinition0(Symbol g2ClassName_)

getDefinition

public G2Definition getDefinition(Symbol g2ClassName_)
                           throws G2AccessException
Returns the G2Definition corresponding to a G2 class-name.
Parameters:
g2ClassName_ - a Symbol naming a G2 class that exists in the remote G2
Returns:
the G2Definition object corresponding to the named class
Throws:
G2AccessException - if there are any communication errors or if no class exists by that name

getClassAttributeValue

public Object getClassAttributeValue(Symbol className,
                                     Symbol attrName)
                              throws G2AccessException
Always returns a non-null value for the attribute, if possible. It walks up the inheritance tree for inheritable attributes, if necessary.
